name: Assimilate (Bazyleeshek)
description:
Entry for 7DRL 2021!

CONTROLS

WSAD / arrow keys - movement

LMB - attack

Space - take over enemy body / leave current body

E - open health packs

P - pause menu

Esc - close the game (only the downloadable version)

TOOLS USED

Engine - Unity 2020.2.2f1

Art - Aseprite

Sound effects - sfxr

Music - Bosca Ceoil

The rain sound effect downloaded from freesound.org
